title: Question Regarding Project Cores
body:
So currently i have all first strike icons, and am sitting on 48 Project cores (more than can be used in these events to my knowledge), and i want to ask, are these going to have a use other than these project things?

And if not are they going to be removed at some point later on (because it will be slightly annoying having them sit there for nothing)?

replies.body:
There's some info on the FAQ:

>All PROJECT content will stay in your Hextech Crafting inventory once the event is over. If you prefer a tidy inventory, you'll be able to disenchant all PROJECT materials into a little bit of essence.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ
Yeah I have a lot of project cores also, how do you get the blueprints ?

Someone else had asked the same question, but just to make sure you know also. The project cores will be still be use for the icons, but currently the project cores will have no other use until Riot can think up of something to put the project cores to use.
